This means that the students must complete the test steps and answer the questions without seeking help from anyone, including by referring to books or other sources (unless the test is designated as an open-book test). Third, supervision. This means that during the test, supervision must be conducted intensively to prevent cheating, ensure the test runs orderly, and serve as an effort to obtain authentic results.
